extendedInfo.description: Alpha version - much more features soon available!Control your X32 with your smartphone or tablet!Features:- Change volume of all channels- Change every monitor mix- Change gate and dynamics threshold- Change eq settings- Calibrated meters to match the X32- Change GEQ- Up to 4 devices per X32 (limited by the console itself)Remote control app for Behringer X32.

reviews.title: Works on Asus TF300T
reviews.comment: Awesome! I\'ve been wanting to run sound at my church from my android tablet and now I can! Keep up the GREAT work! Loving it! I can run the basics with no problem!
reviews.author: Nathan Stanford II

reviews.title: X32
reviews.comment: Great app yes finaly one for android im not a fan with apple its ben working good for me some small issue but emailed him and fixed it. Keep up the good work
reviews.author: Mike Chapman

reviews.title: Great on SGS4G with CM9
reviews.comment: Far better than the betas of many developers!  Runs well on Samsung Galaxy S 4G (rooted with branch of Cyanogen Mod 9 ICS). Does not run on SGS4G stock ROM.
reviews.author: Joshua Kelley

reviews.title: About time!
reviews.comment: Thank you!  Behringer has done nothing but reply \"the software is currently under development\" and that was almost a year ago and you bust this app out thank you I hate Apple and I look forward to useing this and seeing it develop into a kick a** program.
reviews.author: Cody lisle

reviews.title: LOVE!!!!!!!
reviews.comment: LOVE!!!!!
reviews.author: Jordan McLean

reviews.title: 5 stars for effort
reviews.comment: I\'ve only tried the basics out and although I got the message the my x32 wasn\'t supposed the app worked very well. Failed to connect the first time but 2nd time lucky. I really hope the development continues as this will be a handy addition to the x32.
reviews.author: Dave Beauclerr

reviews.title: This app is great.
reviews.comment: Works great and now has 31 band editing that makes this perfect. It been updating fast devices that did not work last week work now and I like it.
reviews.author: Nathan Schouw

reviews.title: Happy for this app
reviews.comment: Although it is an alpha version I am happy with what I have seen so far... Please keep this up!
reviews.author: Bryan Cheddar

reviews.title: Works on HTC One X
reviews.comment: I tried it at my church with our new x32. Way cool app. It did lag at one point but only for a couple seconds and it recovered just fine. Going to test this app out on my Sony Tablet S on Saturday.  Thanks for making this app. I don\'t feel like joining the Apple fan club just to be able to make settings changes on the fly while being confined to the sound booth. Keep up the good work :)
reviews.author: Jon M

reviews.title: Awesome app. Well done.
reviews.comment: After some connecting issues with router.  Make sure WiFi password allows network access as well as internet! All is good :-) love it. Some graphical interface for eq would be awesome. Job well done. Thanks so much!
reviews.author: Darren Bovis-Coulter

reviews.title: Great start so far
reviews.comment: Great to be be able to use android to control the x32 finaly.  No issues with network connection (note 10.1)  Rotary dials are not that smooth/easy to use.  Anything you want a hand testing shout
reviews.author: Dean H

reviews.title: Thank you for getting this app
reviews.comment: Really great my friend you will be the man of x32 history, I\'m very sure Behringer will be very great full to you if you can give us this app to use it with the console live.
reviews.author: Prabhakar M.S

reviews.title: On LG
reviews.comment: It was connects to my board but I would get a error over and over it would say QSC something I do not remember
reviews.author: Jeromie Renfro

reviews.title: Looking good.
reviews.comment: Have an X32 coming in a couple of weeks. Would love to be able to use this. I\'ll be testing this as soon as I have the console.
reviews.author: Brent Avera

reviews.comment: Does not connect on Jellybean 4.3 on Nexus 10. Continually searching. Any ideas?
reviews.author: Margaret Jeffery

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been waiting years for something like this to come along. Hope you get it up and running soon, good luck!
reviews.author: Kyland Evans

reviews.title: Looking good.
reviews.comment: Looks like a promising start. I can\'t wait for the day I can leave my iPad at home and just bring my phone or Nexus 7. I will be keeping an eye on this project.
reviews.author: Joseph Klaus

reviews.title: Really Promising
reviews.comment: Looks really good so far, can\'t wait to see the finished product
reviews.author: GreenSmiths Co

reviews.title: Looks really promising
reviews.comment: Great work, I really hope you can integrate it with the x32.
reviews.author: Andy Harding

reviews.comment: Great s
reviews.author: Benjamin Johnson
